mapper.insert: insert into paramsfile (ID, FILENAME, DATE, USERID, FILEPATH) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
